import axios from'axios';import FormData from'form-data';import*as actionTypes from'./actionTypes';// SuccessHandler for User profile api
export var userDetailsSuccess=function userDetailsSuccess(userProfile){return{type:actionTypes.GET_USERDETAIL_SUCCESS,userProfile:userProfile};};export var userUpdateSuccess=function userUpdateSuccess(userProfile){return{type:actionTypes.UPDATE_USERDETAILS_SUCCESS,userProfile:userProfile};};export var userUpdateFailure=function userUpdateFailure(error){return{type:actionTypes.UPDATE_USERDETAILS_FAILURE,error:error};};export var getUserProfile=function getUserProfile(userToken){return function(dispatch){var userData=new FormData();userData.append("token",userToken);axios.post(actionTypes.API_URL+"User/getbytoken/",userData).then(function(response){console.log('inside profile data response inside userProfile');console.log("res ***"+JSON.stringify(response.data));var userProfile=response.data;dispatch(userDetailsSuccess(userProfile));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var updateUserProfile=function updateUserProfile(userProfile){return function(dispatch){axios.post(actionTypes.API_URL+"User/userprofileupdate/",userProfile).then(function(response){console.log('inside profile update call');console.log(JSON.stringify(response.data));var userProfile=response.data;if(response.data.success===1){dispatch(userUpdateSuccess(userProfile));}else{dispatch(userUpdateFailure(userProfile.error.errormsg));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
